title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserving a little cooking water.
Mix pasta with pancetta, then stir in egg mixture off heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Simmer tomato puree and cream in a pan.
Add chicken and cook for 5 mins.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
